room_title: Escape room "Escape the Colosseum" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: Fun, challenging. Good value for the price we paid. Good activity for friends. Would recommend at least 4 people to make the challenge doable as any fewer might make it hard to finish all the challenges on time.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Colosseum" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: It was an awesome experience! Cat was very helpful and made the adventure for an hour one to remember! I would go again as this was a group of women and we did escape! Couldn't have done it without each one of the ladies including our Cat! Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Colosseum" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: What a “Great Escape” room. We did the Coliseum room (90 min). The puzzles were fun and engaging.
